      • upgrade

        public Object upgrade(kotlinx.coroutines.experimental.io.ByteReadChannel input,
                      kotlinx.coroutines.experimental.io.ByteWriteChannel output,
                      kotlin.coroutines.experimental.CoroutineContext engineContext,
                      kotlin.coroutines.experimental.CoroutineContext userContext,
                      kotlin.coroutines.experimental.Continuation<? super kotlinx.coroutines.experimental.Job> $continuation)

        Upgrades an HTTP connection

        参数:
        input - is a ByteReadChannel for an upgraded connection
        output - is a ByteWriteChannel for an upgraded connection
        engineContext - is a CoroutineContext to execute non-blocking code, such as parsing or processing
        userContext - is a CoroutineContext to execute user-provided callbacks or code potentially blocking
